short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the classic game in a chocolate flavour!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play the classic game in a chocolate flavour! 

Now play the exciting game in a mini version while you work. Take a break and break the chocolates. 

Please find the instructions below.

1. All the squares are filled with numbers and bombs. There are 9 squares having a bomb.
2. Open a square by touching the chocolate.
3. If you open a square with 0, all the squares having 0 will be opened. 
4. Right click on a square to mark it as a Bomb.
5. You will win if you open all the squares except those are marked as Bombs which will be nine squares.
